==Details==
===Description=== Shards are an item dropped when defeating any kind of Pokemon. These typed shard can be invested into the Shards tab to increase type effectivity, and your damage output.
===Upgrades=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! To Purchase Level !! Shard Cost |- | 1 || 500 |- | 2 || 1000 |- | 3 || 1500 |- | 4 || 2000 |- | 5 || 2500 |- | 6 || 3000 |- | 7 || 3500 |- | 8 || 4000 |- | 9 || 4500 |- | 10 || 5000 |}
==Methods== ===Helpful tips=== The shard types reflect whatever type(s) the Pokemon defeated were. Defeating Pokemon in a Dungeon give you 3 Shards of whatever types the Pokemon was, however defeating the boss will give you 20 Shards. Pokemon in Gyms give you 5 shards each, and Wild Pokemon on Routes give you 1.
